com.unitedcaterers.client
Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
  com.unitedcaterers.client.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class is the controller of the client application. All the user actions are handled by this class. Depending on user action (for example, user clicking on a menu item), it uses appropriate server method and performs the necessary action. Depending on the result of the operation, if the view has to change, it updates the model and notifies the observers thus refreshing the view.

Field Detail

rmiorsocket

public static java.lang.String rmiorsocket
This variable is required only because we have multiple implementations of the project: rmi and socket. In your actual project, you will not need this.

Constructor Detail

ClientController

public ClientController(ClientFrame clientFrame,
                        java.lang.String clientType)
This constructor takes a ClientFrame and the clientType, which should be rmi, socket, or none. If none is passed, it denotes that a no remote server is to be used. It does the following two things - - creates an object of class ClientModel, which contains the data needed by the ClientFrame to display to the user. - sets the clientframe as an observer to this model and notifies it.

Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ae)
All the action events in the application GUI, upon which some action has to be taken, data has to be changed, or the view has to be changed, come to this method. It identifies the action and delegates the control to appropriate doXXX method.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
Parameters:
ae - The action event. ActionCommand identifies the action.

doBookCaterer

public void doBookCaterer(java.lang.String action)
Books a caterer. .It identifies the caterer by looking at the row no. attached to the action parameter ( BOOK_CATERER:12, here 12 is the row index). .It calls the bookCaterer method on the server. .It pops up appropriate messages if something is wrong. .Finally, it refreshes the display.

Parameters:
action - The the complete action command that has row index attached to it.

doExit

public void doExit()
Closes the connections and exits

doSearchCaterers

public void doSearchCaterers()
It pops up standard imputdialog boxes to get the search criteria and then uses the searchCaterer(...) methods to retrive the matching caterers. It calls refreshView() method that updates the model and notifies observers thereby updating the view frame.
